reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Promoting UK best practices on e-governance in India to enhance service delivery and transparency in public bureaucracy

description.narrative: Identify areas in which HMG can assist the Government of India in improving e-governance practices. The project will assess India's e-governance processes and identify areas to improve digital governance, administrative capability and public sector reforms. A uniform IT framework will enhance service delivery benefitting domestic and international firms.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
